archimate:ApplicationProcess.name: Engage Glutes
archimate:ApplicationProcess.documentation: Engage your Glutes (buttocks muscles) to come into full Bridge: Squeeze your glutes (crack the walnut) to lift your pelvis completely off the ground as you begin to “bridge” up. Do not arch your lower back. Your abdominals and glutes are now working together as a force couple to lift your pubic bone to the sky. Even though your glutes are now involved, maintain your abdominal engagement throughout
